channel.title: CVE Feed for Helix -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Helix -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-5759|2024-01-04T17:18:40.109Z -- helix -- helix%20core
item.description: In Helix Core versions prior to 2023.2, an unauthenticated remote Denial of Service (DoS) via the buffer was identified. Reported by Jason Geffner.

item.title: CVE-2023-45319|2024-01-04T17:21:16.038Z -- helix -- helix%20core
item.description: In Helix Core versions prior to 2023.2, an unauthenticated remote Denial of Service (DoS) via the commit function was identified. Reported by Jason Geffner.

item.title: CVE-2023-45849|2024-01-04T17:20:00.910Z -- helix -- helix%20core
item.description: An arbitrary code execution which results in privilege escalation was discovered in Helix Core versions prior to 2023.2. Reported by Jason Geffner.

item.title: CVE-2023-35767|2024-02-01T22:39:39.464Z -- helix -- helix%20core
item.description: In Helix Core versions prior to 2023.2, an unauthenticated remote Denial of Service (DoS) via the shutdown function was identified. Reported by Jason Geffner.

item.title: CVE-2024-0325|2024-02-01T22:03:57.425Z -- helix -- sync
item.description: In Helix Sync versions prior to 2024.1, a local command injection was identified. Reported by Bryan Riggins.
